title: White House Climate Adviser Gina McCarthy On Summit
description:
How will the US slash emissions by 2030? White House climate adviser Gina McCarthy talks to NPR's Scott Detrow ahead of this week's climate summit with world leaders.

This episode: White House correspondents Ayesha Rascoe and Scott Detrow.

itunes:title: White House Climate Adviser Gina McCarthy On Summit
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: President Biden hosts a virtual summit of world leaders focused on confronting climate change on Thursday. His national climate adviser Gina McCarthy talks about their strategy.
itunes:subtitle: President Biden hosts a virtual summit of world leaders focused on confronting climate change on Thursday. His national climate adviser Gina McCarthy talks about their strategy.
